column2: Displayed are Enterococcus counts.  The maximum daily limit is 104 colonies/100 mL
A swimming advisory is declared by the DCR for the following day if counts exceed 104
colonies/100 mL or if the 5-day running geometric mean exceeds 35 colonies/100 mL
Daily rainfall totals from Logan Airport, National Weather Service raingauge
All results are in colonies/100 mL and testing is performed by DCR and MWRA.
2006 beach monitoring is conducted daily beginning July 1, and ended September 4.
A swimming advisory is posted due to either high Enterococcus counts or rainfall.
